title: 1936년 Wilson 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Wilson. 판결일: 1936-03-25. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: WILSON v. STATE
**판결일**: 1936-03-25
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Morrow

## 변호인

Gray & Pope, of Tyler, for appellant., Lloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 92 S.W.2d 1026

## 판결문 요약


MORROW, Presiding Judge.
The offense is driving an automobile upon the public highway while intoxicated; *1027penalty assessed at confinement in the penitentiary for two years. .
The indictment appears regular. The record is before us without statement of facts or bills of exception. No error has been perceived or pointed out.
The judgment is affirmed.
...
